name: Sunday at the Memories ~The Girl at the Fountain~
name_original: Sunday at the Memories ~The Girl at the Fountain~
description:
An entry to the 2017 Yuri Game Jam.

Note: While the story is pretty much complete, this initial release is lacking in content in some areas due to time constraints. There will be a future release that will add the missing content.

Story

The setting is the present-day Philippines.

Jacqueline reminisces her time with a girl named Rayzelle Anne while listening to old songs on the radio every Sunday morning.

And then, the girl she misses the most comes back, with just one roadblock in their way...

Credits

Conceptualization, Story, UI Design, Programming, and Debugging
Benedict "Moonlight Bomber" Villariaza

Conceptual Character Design

Character Design and Sprites
